Description: Start push-button to begin filling sequence
Temperature OK switch (1 when within allowed range)
Humidity OK switch (1 when within allowed range)
Force switch measuring cap tightening force
Camera image OK (1 = match to ideal image)
HVAC high-pressure coil for purge (ON for 10 min)
Robot actuator to load bulk vaccine into dosing chamber
20 valve bank for parallel filling (one coil triggers group)
Vacuum gripper to pick caps from dispenser
Actuator that applies load for cap tightening
Actuator that pushes failed vial off conveyor
Air blowers for drying after washing
